isis.stitle: 7 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER SERIES - REASSEMBLE - SHIFTER HOUSING

note.para: When installing lockscrews, make sure that the end of the lockscrew seats in the bore in the bar. Tighten lockscrews to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N· m). Excessive torque can result in distortion of the bars. Use lockwire on all lockscrews.

step1.para: If previously removed, install the plunger and spring in the block ( inset, Figure 84) and secure with plug. Apply pressure against the plug to compress the spring fully. Tighten plug and then back off 1/4 to 1/2 turn. Stake the threads in the hole on the side of the block.

figure.caption: Figure 84. Install Plunger and Spring in Block and Secure With Plug

step1.para: If previously removed, install the plunger, springs, retainer ( inset, Figure 85) and snap ring in direct block, making sure the snap ring is seated in the groove of the block.

figure.caption: Figure 85. Install Plunger, Springs, Retainer and Snap Ring

step1.para: Secure the housing in a vise as shown ( Figure 86). Install 1st-reverse finger, bar and block.
Install bolts and wire securely ( Figure 87).

figure.caption: Figure 87. Install Bolts and Wire Securely

note.para: Make sure the short bolt is used in the 1st-reverse finger.

step1.para: Install an interlock ball in the housing bore against the bar ( Figure 88).

figure.caption: Figure 88. Install Interlock Ball in Housing Bore

step1.para: Install 2nd and 3rd speed block and yoke on bar ( Figure 89). Install interlock pin in the bar as it enters the housing (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 89. Install 2nd and 3rd Speed Block and Yoke

step1.para: Install an interlock ball in the housing bore against the bar ( Figure 90).

figure.caption: Figure 90. Install Interlock Ball in Housing Bore

step1.para: Install 4th and 5th speed yoke, spacer and bar ( Figure 91). Install interlock pin in the bar as it enters the housing (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 91. Install 4th and 5th Speed Yoke, Spacer and Bar

step1.para: Install the remaining interlock ball in the housing bore against the bar ( Figure 92).

figure.caption: Figure 92. Install Remaining Interlock Ball in Housing Bore

step1.para: Install the direct yoke, block and bar in the housing ( Figure 93). Tighten bolts to 34 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m) and lockwire securely.

figure.caption: Figure 93. Install Direct Yoke, Block and Bar

step1.para: Install four balls in the tension spring bores ( Figure 94) and install four tension springs (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 94. Install Balls in Tension Spring Bores and Install Tension Springs

step1.para: Install gasket and tension spring cover ( Figure 95).

figure.caption: Figure 95. Install Gasket and Tension Spring Cover
